synopsis.text: Japanâ€”from its local foods and landmarks, to its unique daily school life, and even the attitude of its residents. As Kamitsuki navigates his new life in Gunma, he discovers that the prefecture is not as terrifying as the internet made it out to be. In fact, it is a place full of warmth, charm, and quirks that make it unlike any other place in Japan. With the help of his new friends, Kamitsuki sets out to debunk the negative stereotypes surrounding Gunma and uncover the true beauty of this misunderstood prefecture. Will he succeed in his mission, or will Gunma remain the world's last unexplored territory? Join Kamitsuki on his hilarious and heartwarming journey to discover the real truth about Gunma in this comedy manga series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
